sqlExec:
update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Paulo","tC":"v","rL":["G3972"],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"prisioneiro ","tC":"v","rL":["G1198"]},{"sq":3,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"Cristo ","tC":"v","rL":["G5547"]},{"sq":5,"T":"Jesus","tC":"v","rL":["G2424"]},{"sq":6,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":7,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":8,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"irmão ","tC":"v","rL":["G80"]},{"sq":10,"T":"Timóteo","tC":"v","rL":["G5095"]},{"sq":11,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":12,"T":"ao ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":13,"T":"amado ","tC":"v","rL":["G27"]},{"sq":14,"T":"Filemom","tC":"v","rL":["G5371"]},{"sq":15,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":16,"T":"também ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":17,"T":"nosso ","tC":"v","rL":["G2257"]},{"sq":18,"T":"colaborador","tC":"v","rL":["G4904"]},{"sq":19,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Paulo, prisioneiro de Cristo Jesus, e o irmão Timóteo, ao amado Filemom, também nosso colaborador,' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 1
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":1,"T":"à ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"irmã ","tC":"v","rL":["G80"]},{"sq":3,"T":"Áfia","tC":"v","rL":["G682"]},{"sq":4,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":5,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":6,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"Arquipo","tC":"v","rL":["G751"]},{"sq":8,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":9,"T":"nosso ","tC":"v","rL":["G2257"]},{"sq":10,"T":"companheiro ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"lutas","tC":"v","rL":["G4961"]},{"sq":13,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":14,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":15,"T":"à ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":16,"T":"igreja ","tC":"v","rL":["G1577"]},{"sq":17,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"está ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":19,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":["G2596"]},{"sq":20,"T":"tua ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":21,"T":"casa","tC":"v","rL":["G3624"]},{"sq":22,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'e à irmã Áfia, e a Arquipo, nosso companheiro de lutas, e à igreja que está em tua casa,' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 2
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"graça ","tC":"v","rL":["G5485"]},{"sq":1,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":2,"T":"paz ","tC":"v","rL":["G1515"]},{"sq":3,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"vós ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"outros","tC":"v","rL":["G5213"]},{"sq":6,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":7,"T":"da ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"parte ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":["G575"]},{"sq":10,"T":"Deus","tC":"v","rL":["G2316"]},{"sq":11,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":12,"T":"nosso ","tC":"v","rL":["G2257"]},{"sq":13,"T":"Pai","tC":"v","rL":["G3962"]},{"sq":14,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":15,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":16,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":17,"T":"Senhor ","tC":"v","rL":["G2962"]},{"sq":18,"T":"Jesus ","tC":"v","rL":["G2424"]},{"sq":19,"T":"Cristo","tC":"v","rL":["G5547"]},{"sq":20,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'graça e paz a vós outros, da parte de Deus, nosso Pai, e do Senhor Jesus Cristo.' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 3
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Dou ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"graças ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":2,"T":"ao ","tC":"v","rL":["G2168","G5719"]},{"sq":3,"T":"meu ","tC":"v","rL":["G3450"]},{"sq":4,"T":"Deus","tC":"v","rL":["G2316"]},{"sq":5,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":6,"T":"lembrando-me","tC":"v","rL":["G4160","G5734","G3417"]},{"sq":7,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":8,"T":"sempre","tC":"v","rL":["G3842"]},{"sq":9,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":10,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"ti ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":12,"T":"nas ","tC":"v","rL":["G1909"]},{"sq":13,"T":"minhas ","tC":"v","rL":["G3450"]},{"sq":14,"T":"orações","tC":"v","rL":["G4335"]},{"sq":15,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Dou graças ao meu Deus, lembrando-me, sempre, de ti nas minhas orações,' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 4
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"estando ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"ciente ","tC":"v","rL":["G191","G5723"]},{"sq":2,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"teu ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":4,"T":"amor ","tC":"v","rL":["G26"]},{"sq":5,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":6,"T":"da ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"fé ","tC":"v","rL":["G4102"]},{"sq":8,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":9,"T":"tens ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5719"]},{"sq":10,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":11,"T":"com ","tC":"v","rL":["G4314"]},{"sq":12,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":13,"T":"Senhor ","tC":"v","rL":["G2962"]},{"sq":14,"T":"Jesus ","tC":"v","rL":["G2424"]},{"sq":15,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532","G1519"]},{"sq":16,"T":"todos ","tC":"v","rL":["G3956"]},{"sq":17,"T":"os ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"santos","tC":"v","rL":["G40"]},{"sq":19,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'estando ciente do teu amor e da fé que tens para com o Senhor Jesus e todos os santos,' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 5
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3704"]},{"sq":2,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"comunhão ","tC":"v","rL":["G2842"]},{"sq":4,"T":"da ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"tua ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":6,"T":"fé ","tC":"v","rL":["G4102"]},{"sq":7,"T":"se ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"torne ","tC":"v","rL":["G1096","G5638"]},{"sq":9,"T":"eficiente ","tC":"v","rL":["G1756"]},{"sq":10,"T":"no ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":11,"T":"pleno ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"conhecimento ","tC":"v","rL":["G1922"]},{"sq":13,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":14,"T":"todo ","tC":"v","rL":["G3956"]},{"sq":15,"T":"bem ","tC":"v","rL":["G18"]},{"sq":16,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3588"]},{"sq":17,"T":"há ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":19,"T":"nós","tC":"v","rL":["G2257"]},{"sq":20,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":21,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":22,"T":"com ","tC":"v","rL":["G1519"]},{"sq":23,"T":"Cristo","tC":"v","rL":["G5547"]},{"sq":24,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'para que a comunhão da tua fé se torne eficiente no pleno conhecimento de todo bem que há em nós, para com Cristo.' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 6
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Pois","tC":"v","rL":["G1063"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"irmão","tC":"v","rL":["G80"]},{"sq":3,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":4,"T":"tive ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5719"]},{"sq":5,"T":"grande ","tC":"v","rL":["G4183"]},{"sq":6,"T":"alegria ","tC":"v","rL":["G5485"]},{"sq":7,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":8,"T":"conforto ","tC":"v","rL":["G3874"]},{"sq":9,"T":"no ","tC":"v","rL":["G1909"]},{"sq":10,"T":"teu ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":11,"T":"amor","tC":"v","rL":["G26"]},{"sq":12,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":13,"T":"porquanto ","tC":"v","rL":["G3754"]},{"sq":14,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":15,"T":"coração ","tC":"v","rL":["G4698"]},{"sq":16,"T":"dos ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":17,"T":"santos ","tC":"v","rL":["G40"]},{"sq":18,"T":"tem ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":19,"T":"sido ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":20,"T":"reanimado ","tC":"v","rL":["G373","G5769"]},{"sq":21,"T":"por ","tC":"v","rL":["G1223"]},{"sq":22,"T":"teu ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":23,"T":"intermédio","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":24,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Pois, irmão, tive grande alegria e conforto no teu amor, porquanto o coração dos santos tem sido reanimado por teu intermédio.' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 7
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Pois ","tC":"v","rL":[],"pr":true},{"sq":1,"T":"bem","tC":"v","rL":["G1352"]},{"sq":2,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":3,"T":"ainda ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"eu ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"sinta ","tC":"v","rL":["G2192","G5723"]},{"sq":7,"T":"plena ","tC":"v","rL":["G4183"]},{"sq":8,"T":"liberdade ","tC":"v","rL":["G3954"]},{"sq":9,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":10,"T":"Cristo ","tC":"v","rL":["G5547"]},{"sq":11,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"te ","tC":"v","rL":["G4671"]},{"sq":13,"T":"ordenar ","tC":"v","rL":["G2004","G5721"]},{"sq":14,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":15,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":16,"T":"convém","tC":"v","rL":["G433","G5723"]},{"sq":17,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Pois bem, ainda que eu sinta plena liberdade em Cristo para te ordenar o que convém,' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 8
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"prefiro","tC":"v","rL":["G3123"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"todavia","tC":"v","rL":["G1223"]},{"sq":3,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":4,"T":"solicitar ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"nome ","tC":"v","rL":["G3870","G5719"]},{"sq":7,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"amor","tC":"v","rL":["G26"]},{"sq":9,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":10,"T":"sendo ","tC":"v","rL":["G5607","G5752"]},{"sq":11,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G5108"]},{"sq":13,"T":"sou","tC":"v","rL":["G5613"]},{"sq":14,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":15,"T":"Paulo","tC":"v","rL":["G3972"]},{"sq":16,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":17,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"velho ","tC":"v","rL":["G4246"]},{"sq":19,"T":"e","tC":"v"},{"sq":20,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":21,"T":"agora","tC":"v","rL":["G3570"]},{"sq":22,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":23,"T":"até ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":24,"T":"prisioneiro ","tC":"v","rL":["G1198"]},{"sq":25,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":26,"T":"Cristo ","tC":"v","rL":["G5547"]},{"sq":27,"T":"Jesus","tC":"v","rL":["G2424"]},{"sq":28,"T":"; ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'prefiro, todavia, solicitar em nome do amor, sendo o que sou, Paulo, o velho e, agora, até prisioneiro de Cristo Jesus;' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 9
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"sim, ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"solicito-te ","tC":"v","rL":["G3870","G5719","G4571"]},{"sq":2,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"favor ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":["G4012"]},{"sq":5,"T":"meu ","tC":"v","rL":["G1699"]},{"sq":6,"T":"filho ","tC":"v","rL":["G5043"]},{"sq":7,"T":"Onésimo","tC":"v","rL":["G3682"]},{"sq":8,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":9,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":10,"T":"gerei ","tC":"v","rL":["G1080","G5656"]},{"sq":11,"T":"entre ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722","G3450"]},{"sq":12,"T":"algemas","tC":"v","rL":["G1199"]},{"sq":13,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'sim, solicito-te em favor de meu filho Onésimo, que gerei entre algemas.' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 10
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Ele","tC":"v","rL":["G3588"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"antes","tC":"v","rL":["G4218"]},{"sq":3,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":4,"T":"te ","tC":"v","rL":["G4671"]},{"sq":5,"T":"foi ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"inútil","tC":"v","rL":["G890"]},{"sq":7,"T":"; ","tC":"v"},{"sq":8,"T":"atualmente, ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"porém","tC":"v","rL":["G1161"]},{"sq":10,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":11,"T":"é ","tC":"v","rL":["G3570"]},{"sq":12,"T":"útil","tC":"v","rL":["G2173"]},{"sq":13,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":14,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":15,"T":"ti ","tC":"v","rL":["G4671"]},{"sq":16,"T":"e ","tC":"v","rL":["G2532"]},{"sq":17,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"mim","tC":"v","rL":["G1698"]},{"sq":19,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Ele, antes, te foi inútil; atualmente, porém, é útil, a ti e a mim.' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 11
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Eu ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":1,"T":"to ","tC":"v","rL":["G3739"]},{"sq":2,"T":"envio ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"volta ","tC":"v","rL":["G375","G5656","G4771"]},{"sq":5,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"pessoa","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":7,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":8,"T":"quero ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"dizer","tC":"v","rL":["G5123","G5748"]},{"sq":10,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":11,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"meu ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":13,"T":"próprio ","tC":"v","rL":["G1699"]},{"sq":14,"T":"coração","tC":"v","rL":["G4698"]},{"sq":15,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Eu to envio de volta em pessoa, quero dizer, o meu próprio coração.' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 12
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Eu ","tC":"v","rL":["G1473"]},{"sq":1,"T":"queria ","tC":"v","rL":["G1014","G5711"]},{"sq":2,"T":"conservá-lo ","tC":"v","rL":["G2722","G5721"]},{"sq":3,"T":"comigo ","tC":"v","rL":["G4314"]},{"sq":4,"T":"mesmo ","tC":"v","rL":["G1683"]},{"sq":5,"T":"para","tC":"v","rL":["G2443"]},{"sq":6,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":7,"T":"em ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"teu ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":9,"T":"lugar","tC":"v","rL":["G5228"]},{"sq":10,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":11,"T":"me ","tC":"v","rL":["G3427"]},{"sq":12,"T":"servir ","tC":"v","rL":["G1247","G5725"]},{"sq":13,"T":"nas ","tC":"v","rL":["G1722"]},{"sq":14,"T":"algemas ","tC":"v","rL":["G1199"]},{"sq":15,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":16,"T":"carrego ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":17,"T":"por ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"causa ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":19,"T":"do ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":20,"T":"evangelho","tC":"v","rL":["G2098"]},{"sq":21,"T":"; ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Eu queria conservá-lo comigo mesmo para, em teu lugar, me servir nas algemas que carrego por causa do evangelho;' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 13
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"nada","tC":"v","rL":["G3762"]},{"sq":1,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":2,"T":"porém","tC":"v","rL":["G1161"]},{"sq":3,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":4,"T":"quis ","tC":"v","rL":["G2309","G5656"]},{"sq":5,"T":"fazer ","tC":"v","rL":["G4160","G5658"]},{"sq":6,"T":"sem ","tC":"v","rL":["G5565"]},{"sq":7,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"teu ","tC":"v","rL":["G4674"]},{"sq":9,"T":"consentimento","tC":"v","rL":["G1106"]},{"sq":10,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":11,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":12,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G3363"]},{"sq":13,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":14,"T":"tua ","tC":"v","rL":["G4675"]},{"sq":15,"T":"bondade ","tC":"v","rL":["G18"]},{"sq":16,"T":"não ","tC":"v","rL":["G3363"]},{"sq":17,"T":"venha ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":18,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":19,"T":"ser ","tC":"v","rL":["G5600","G5753"]},{"sq":20,"T":"como ","tC":"v","rL":["G5613"]},{"sq":21,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":22,"T":"por ","tC":"v","rL":["G2596"]},{"sq":23,"T":"obrigação","tC":"v","rL":["G318"]},{"sq":24,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":25,"T":"mas ","tC":"v","rL":["G235"]},{"sq":26,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":27,"T":"livre ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":28,"T":"vontade","tC":"v","rL":["G1595","G2596"]},{"sq":29,"T":". ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'nada, porém, quis fazer sem o teu consentimento, para que a tua bondade não venha a ser como que por obrigação, mas de livre vontade.' 
            where verse.id_book = 57 
            and verse.number_chapter = 1
            and verse.number_verse = 14
            and verse.id_bible_version = (select b.id from bible_version b where b.hash='3bacbf2808d23b43584cf0b591d1a879' limit 1) ;

update verse set content = '[{"sq":0,"T":"Pois ","tC":"v","rL":["G1063","G1223"]},{"sq":1,"T":"acredito ","tC":"v","rL":["G5029"]},{"sq":2,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":3,"T":"ele ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":4,"T":"veio ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":5,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":6,"T":"ser ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":7,"T":"afastado ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":8,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":9,"T":"ti ","tC":"v","rL":["G5563","G5681"]},{"sq":10,"T":"temporariamente","tC":"v","rL":["G4314","G5610"]},{"sq":11,"T":", ","tC":"v"},{"sq":12,"T":"a ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":13,"T":"fim ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":14,"T":"de ","tC":"v","rL":["G5124"]},{"sq":15,"T":"que ","tC":"v","rL":["G2443"]},{"sq":16,"T":"o ","tC":"v","rL":["G846"]},{"sq":17,"T":"recebas ","tC":"v","rL":["G568","G5719"]},{"sq":18,"T":"para ","tC":"v","rL":[]},{"sq":19,"T":"sempre","tC":"v","rL":["G166"]},{"sq":20,"T":", ","tC":"v"}]',  content_with_out_format = 'Pois acredito que ele veio a ser afastado de ti temporariamente, a fim de que o recebas para sempre,'
